articles.title: Bonobos Can Tell When a Human Doesn’t Know Something - Scientific American
articles.description: An experiment shows that bonobos can understand when a human lacks knowledge and point them in the right direction

articles.title: 'Roasting marshmallow' exoplanet is so hot, it rains metal. How did it form? - Space.com
articles.description: "The climate of this planet is extreme and nothing like that of Earth. The planet's dayside is so hot that elements typically thought of as 'metal' are vaporized into the atmosphere."
